group_1.textLeft: Oh, now really... You don't need to@apologize.

group_1.textRight: No, I do.
This whole problem started in my house.
Hey, you say sorry, too.

group_1.textLeft: Felicia.

group_1.textRight: Sorry...

group_1.textLeft: Um, I'm...I'm sorry, too.

group_1.textCenter: I was concerned how the rumor about@Mitama had started at school.
When I asked around, the trail led right to@Tsukuyo.
She told me that Mitama asked her to@spread the rumor, as a favor.

group_1.textRight: So if you trace it back to the original@cause, it's got to be you.

group_1.textLeft: Huh?
I wasn't tryin' to hurt her or anythin'!

group_1.textRight: This is why I told you from the start.
If someone doesn't want to talk about@something, you should leave it be.

group_1.textLeft: But!

group_1.textRight: I think making posters and hanging them up@was a little too much.

group_1.textLeft: Grngh...

group_1.textRight: I'll go with you. Let's apologize to@Mitama together.

group_1.textLeft: Kay...
Then I want to come as well.
I got a bit carried away in the excitement,@too.
I helped cause trouble for her.

group_1.textRight: Okay, then let's all go.

group_1.textLeft: Okay...
It really isn't worth you stressing over.
The story won't disappear that easily.
I'd rather it spread like this than get@thrown about with extra parts tacked on.

group_1.textRight: But even so, we're sorry.

group_1.textLeft: Like I said, it's nothing to worry about!

group_1.textRight: Hey...Mitama?

group_1.textLeft: Yes?
What is it, Felicia?

group_1.textRight: Here, this is to say sorry. It's a Master@Richie sticker...

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Thank you very much. I'd be happy@to accept it.

group_1.textRight: Now we're even, okay!
You could be a little less bratty about it.

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle*

group_1.textRight: I see. It sounds as though things will calm@down.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, everything just fell into place for me.

group_1.textRight: Still, restrain your optimism.
You have no way of knowing if the rumor will@go away.
Let me know if you find yourself in any@trouble.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I plan to do just that.
But no matter how much dirt they dig up...
Only you know the true me, Kanagi.
If you hadn't been there, I'd never have@any peace.

group_1.textRight: Yes, there's no way I'd forget.

group_1.textLeft: Hm, it's already been 2 years...
